prodNameC: 羅氏免疫分析維生素 B12測驗系統
ingredientsDesc: (Reagent)PT1     Pretreatment reagent 1                            4.0mlPT1     Pretreatment reagent 2                            4.0mlM       Streptavidin-coated microparticles                6.5mlR1      Intrinsic factor~Ru(bpy)32+                         10mlR2      Vitamin B12~biotin                                8.5ml(CalSet)B12 Cal1:2 bottles, each for 1.6mL of calibrator 1B12 Cal2:2 bottles, each for 1.6mL of calibrator 2Vitamin B12 in two concentration ranges (approx. 100pg/mL or 74pmol/L and approx.1500pg/mL or 1107 pmol/L) in a human serum matrix, sodium azide <1%, sodium cyanide<0.1%, and preservative.
applicantName: 台灣羅氏醫療診斷設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區民權東路3段2號10樓
efficacy: 體外診斷試劑；在體外以結合分析法針對人類血清和血漿中的維生素B12進行定量檢測。維生素B12或葉酸兩者均是確認維生素B12或葉酸缺乏症的診斷重點，特別是針對巨母紅血球的鑑別診斷而言。Elecsys Vitamin B12  CalSet是使用於Elecsys2010以及MODULAR ANALYTICS E170免疫分析儀上，針對Elecsys Vitamin B12 定量分析法的校正品。
mdFormat: Elecsys Vitamin B12 reagent kit：100 tests      Elecsys Vitamin B12 CalSet：4×1.6 ml

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學用裝置

ingredientsDtoList.ingredientsDesc: (Reagent)PT1     Pretreatment reagent 1                            4.0mlPT1     Pretreatment reagent 2                            4.0mlM       Streptavidin-coated microparticles                6.5mlR1      Intrinsic factor~Ru(bpy)32+                         10mlR2      Vitamin B12~biotin                                8.5ml(CalSet)B12 Cal1:2 bottles, each for 1.6mL of calibrator 1B12 Cal2:2 bottles, each for 1.6mL of calibrator 2Vitamin B12 in two concentration ranges (approx. 100pg/mL or 74pmol/L and approx.1500pg/mL or 1107 pmol/L) in a human serum matrix, sodium azide <1%, sodium cyanide<0.1%, and preservative.
